segments.text: I notice the boy is really determined to get those cookies, no matter how risky it is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s balancing on that wobbly stool like it’s nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I admire his focus, but I’m also terrified he’s going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her turn, completely oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at how innocent they are, just wanting a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But seriously, that stool looks like it’s about to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before and gotten away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so absorbed in her task that she doesn’t even notice them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost funny how clueless she is, but also kind of sad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get their cookies before the whole thing turns into a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
